title: Mystery skin
body: i can't see what i got in mastery skin can u please help me?

replies.body: i can't see what i got in my mystery skin my friend gave me can u please help me?

I took a look at your account and it seems your mystery skin was Atlantean Syndra!

Let me know if you have any other questions.
You should be able to check your gifting history in the account section of the store in the game client to see what your friend gifted you.
